title: Lake Sevan
description: Lake Sevan, is the largest lake in Armenia and one of the largest freshwater high-altitude lakes in the world.

title: Cascade
description: The Cascade in Armenia is a massive staircase complex and cultural landmark located in Yerevan, the capital city.

title: Mother Armenia
description: The Mother Armenia statue is the iconic mom sculpture you’re referring to in Victory Park, Yerevan.

title: Armenian National Opera
description: The Armenian National Opera and Ballet Theatre is a historic and cultural landmark located in the heart of Yerevan.

title: Republic Square
description: Republic Square is the central and most iconic square in Yerevan, Armenia, serving as the political, cultural, and social heart of the city.

title: Garni Temple
description: The Garni Temple is one of Armenia’s most iconic historical sites and the only standing Greco-Roman colonnaded temple in the country.

title: Monastery of Geghard
description: The Monastery of Geghard is one of Armenia’s most famous and visually striking religious sites, known for its rock-cut architecture and rich history.

title: Wings of Tatev
description: The Wings of Tatev is an extraordinary aerial tramway in southern Armenia, renowned for its breathtaking views and remarkable engineering
